sources.title: Bittersweet Monday | Full Drama Romance Movie
sources.description:
Bittersweet Monday - When longtime best friends say their goodbye before a big move, they find themselves holding onto more than just their friendship. Separately in committed marriages, the two experience an emotional shift, exacerbated by the circumstances that bring them together and alone again.

2014. Stars: Philipp Christopher, David Covington, Jaime Lee
*Licensed from Leomark Studios. All rights reserved*
